dcterms:description: A syntactic evaluation suite for monolingual and multilingual models, including subject-verb agreement challenge sets for English, French, German, Hebrew, and Russian, generated from grammars developed by the authors.
dcterms:title: CLAMS (Cross-Linguistic Assessment of Models on Syntax)

dcterms:creator: R. Marvin
T. Linzen
dcterms:description: A challenge set designed for targeted syntactic evaluation of language models, focusing on subject-verb agreement.
dcterms:title: Marvin and Linzen (2018) challenge set
